about_the_game:
🔵 Simple, endless and fun Bubble Wrap.
🎮 Just click and drag to pop the bubbles. Controllers also supported.
🏆 Earn trophies and achievements!
🎉 There's also confetti for special milestones. Yay!!
📝 Customize the bubbles and background however you want.
🔄 Auto-refreshes, so you never run out of Bubble Wrap ever again!


In this demo version:
  • Limited to 1,000 pops
  • Workshop features disabled


Enjoy! 🔵
